name: AE Gun Ball
description:
AE Gun Ball here! The most popular skee ball style game comes to you!

Bring the fun of the boardwalk to the palm of your hand with 3D graphics.

*This game requires an iPhone4 or newer or an iPad2 or newer device to run. Thanks. *

Any feedback please email us, because we can’t reply on comments. Thanks very much for all your support in our games!

Perfect physical performance, tempt you to the game, you just need one finger, and your wit.

Flick the skeeball up the ramp and into the numbered holes to win points, tickets. Pay attention to the shiny holes, hit them and they will give you exponential award of your score.

When you get enough tickets, you can exchange them to tokens, also, you can visit the Shop to Top-Up for more tokens.

If you like American Ball, Skee Ball, iShuffle Bowling, Roller Ball, Basketball, Archer, Air Hockey and other sports games, you shouldn’t miss this game!

Come on! Take up the challenge to get a new high score!

Game includes:
-Impressive 3D graphics
-Amazingly realistic physics
-Scoreloop Support

Get it Now!
